description: This lemon and pistachio rice pudding is a delicious dessert served chilled with rich vanilla cream folded through.
name: Lemon & Pistachio Rice Pudding Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 medium lemon, zest pared with a vegetable peeler
0.8 cup cream, whipped to soft peaks, save 1 tbs for later

recipeInstructions.text: Add the milk to a heavy bottomed saucepan with the lemon zest and bring to the boil. Stir in the rice, reduce the heat and simmer for 2025 minutes, stirring occasionally, until the rice is tender.

Remove the lemon zest and tip the pudding into a bowl to cool. Fold in the caster sugar, vanilla extract and whipped cream. Divide the mix between 4 glasses and serve chilled, topped with chopped pistachios.
